p.strong: Ohio Department of Health Opens Call Center to Help With COVID-19 Response

span.p: (COLUMBUS, Ohio)— Ohio Department of Health Director Amy Acton, MD, MPH, today announced the Ohio Department of Health (ODH) has opened a call center to answer questions regarding coronavirus (COVID-19). The call center will be open 7 days a week from 9:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. and can be reached at 1-833-4-ASK-ODH (1-833-427-5634).

p.strong: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention:

p.a: Ways to Use this Physical Distancing Time to Strengthen Our Health and Social Connections
Let’s Make the Best of Our “Social Distancing” Time to Strengthen Our Health and Wellness!
Ohio Chapter of the American Academy of Pediatrics COVID-19 Information for Parents and Families
